title: Challenge Modifiers
illegalEvolution:
{{pokemon}} changed into an ineligible Pokémon
for this challenge!

singleGeneration.name: Mono Gen
singleGeneration.desc: You can only use Pokémon from Generation {{gen}}.
singleGeneration.desc_default: You can only use Pokémon from the chosen generation.

singleType.name: Mono Type
singleType.desc: You can only use Pokémon with the {{type}} type.
singleType.desc_default: You can only use Pokémon of the chosen type.

freshStart.name: Fresh Start
freshStart.desc: You can only use the original starters without any unlocks, as if you had just started PokéRogue.

inverseBattle.name: Inverse Battle
inverseBattle.desc:
Type matchups are reversed and no type is immune to any other type.
Disables other challenges’ achievements (Except Flip Stat).

flipStat.name: Flip Stat
flipStat.desc:
Stats are flipped as follows:
- HP with Speed
- Attack with Sp. Def
- Defense with Sp. Atk
Disables other challenges’ achievements (Except Inverse Battle).

noAutoHeal.name: No Free Heal
noAutoHeal.desc: Disables the free automatic healing which normally occurs after every 10th wave.

hardcore.name: Hardcore
hardcore.desc: You can no longer revive Pokémon that have fainted.

limitedCatch.name: Limited Catch
limitedCatch.desc: You can only add the first Pokémon of a biome to your current party.

metronome.name: Metronome Mode
metronome.desc:
You can only use Metronome! See how far you can get with pure chance.
This is a mode PURELY for fun and does not award an achievement.
Disables all other achievements.
